name: refrigerated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
kept cold in a fridge: The company makes refrigerated soups. The blood warmers heat refrigerated blood so it can be administered rapidly.
(of a vehicle, room, or container) kept at a very low temperature: The fish is delivered in a refrigerated van. Fizzy drinks on a shelf may be cheaper those in a refrigerated case.
More examplesFewer examplesRefrigerated bread gets stale quicker than bread stored in a bread bin.Refrigerated food needs to be kept at 40 degrees or below.The temperature of the refrigerated boxes is checked twice daily.Officials set up a temporary morgue equipped with refrigerated trucks to preserve bodies.
